0.9.0.name: wordpress/yith-custom-login
0.9.0.description:
Install the plugin and change the default style of wordpress login. Set a pretty style to login page of your website and customize it according to your style! A working demo is available here. Full documentation is available here.

Installation

Once you have installed the plugin, you just need to activate the plugin in order to enable it.

Configuration

YITH Custom Login will add a new page under Appearance -> Login Screen, where you can configure the plugin and customize the frontend page.

Developer

Are you a developer? Want to customize the templates or the style of the plugin? Read on the documentation and discover how to do that.

Support

Hi there, we have good news here: all our plugins are released for f
